scripts.build:circuit:setup:
cd build/circuits && npx snarkjs groth16 setup withdraw.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_16.ptau hongbao_0000.zkey && printf '$(date +%s)
' | npx snarkjs zkey contribute hongbao_0000.zkey hongbao_0001.zkey --name='First Contributor' -v && npx snarkjs zkey export verificationkey hongbao_0001.zkey withdraw_verification_key.json && cd ../..
scripts.build:circuit: mkdir -p build/circuits && npm run build:circuit:download && npm run build:circuit:compile && npm run build:circuit:setup && npm run build:circuit:bin && npm run build:circuit:contract && cd ../..
scripts.build: npm run build:circuit && npm run build:contract && npm run build:browserify
scripts.flat: npx truffle-flattener contracts/ETHTornado.sol > ETHTornado_flat.sol && npx truffle-flattener contracts/ERC20Tornado.sol > ERC20Tornado_flat.sol
